EmailTemplate.subject: Agent {!AccountContactRelation.Agent_Name__c} has removed you from their organization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!AccountContactRelation.Main_Contact_Name__c},
{!AccountContactRelation.Agent_Name__c} has removed your association with their Agency. Please login to the the RSA Portal and refer to your Account Details to confirm this.
https://cdfa.force.com/rsaportal/s/login/
If you have any questions, please contact rsa@cdfa.ca.gov.
Regards, RSA Administrator Division of Measurement Standards California Department of Food and Agriculture
